page.title: 07THE WHITE HOUSE
page.content: The largest house in our area is The White House,which belongs to Lady Waechter.She was born in the house and has always lived there.It has been in her family for three generations. It is a Queen Anne/Georgian house and is a listed building.The kitchen is the oldest part of the house.In the drawing room is an Adams fireplace.The fireplace in the dining room has a surround of hand painted tiles each showing a different hunting scene.Each of the rooms is large and well proportioned. Lady Waechter is one of only a few people to own privately a pack of fox hounds. The pack was established by her grandfather in 1905.She has been working with them since 1931 The pack is the North Ledbury.The hunting season begins after the corn harvest and continues until Spring.
